duties_responsibilities.duty: Support the Accounting Department with producing accurate financial data in compliance with organization standards and regulatory agencies.
Produce financial data following General Accepted Accounting Principles (GAAP) standards.
Manage day-to-day accounting tasks, including bank reconciliations, cash flow and vacancy reporting, and preparing construction loan draw requests.
Perform AP and AR entry at the beginning/end of the month.
Analyze balance sheet and P & L accounts, and record appropriate adjusting journal entries as needed.
Track and calculate loan payments and balances for inter-company loans.
Provide financials for lender reporting and issue partnership distributions.
Help continuously improve the company's efficiency and manage ad hoc projects as needed.
Manage monthly, quarterly, and year-end closing processes, including reconciliations and analysis of related accounts.

education_certification.credential: Education in accounting strongly preferred (Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field)
2 years minimum experience with Yardi Voyager
